settings.title: The Rare Company has years of experience consulting with clients worldwide.
settings.text:
We offer free consultations to help you with the following:

  • Investing in Magic: The Gathering (MTG) art, collectibles, or rarities
  • Professional advice on collecting MTG
  • Selling your MTG collection or decks
  • Information on The Rare Company's appraisal, consignment, deck & set collector fulfillment, and artist brokerage services

We do not offer consultations for non-MTG collectibles or stolen merchandise.

settings.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
settings.mail_gdpr_text: *You're signing up to receive our emails and can unsubscribe at any time.
